    • com.thegongoliers.input.camera.Camera.CameraBuilder
  • Enclosing class:
    Camera

    public static class Camera.CameraBuilder
extends java.lang.Object

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      CameraBuilder() 

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Camera build()
      This method takes all of the specified settings and generates a Camera object.
      Camera.CameraBuilder setCamera(CameraInterface camera)
      This method sets the type of camera being used.
      Camera.CameraBuilder setLEDColor(Camera.LEDColor color)
      This method sets the HSV range of the findTarget method of the Camera class based on the LED color specified.
      Camera.CameraBuilder setManualHSVRange(org.opencv.core.Range hue, org.opencv.core.Range saturation, org.opencv.core.Range value)
      This method sets the HSV range of the findTarget method of the Camera class.
      Camera.CameraBuilder setNormalBrightness(int brightness)
      This sets the default brightness of the camera when it is not in target mode.
      Camera.CameraBuilder setTargetBrightness(int brightness)
      This sets the brightness of the camera during target mode.
      Camera.CameraBuilder setTargetExposure(int exposure)
      This sets the exposure of the camera during target mode.

    • Constructor Detail

      • CameraBuilder

        public CameraBuilder()

    • Method Detail

      • setLEDColor

        public Camera.CameraBuilder setLEDColor(Camera.LEDColor color)
        This method sets the HSV range of the findTarget method of the Camera class based on the LED color specified. Currently, only GREEN is supported.
        Parameters:
        color - The color of the led.
        Returns:
        The CameraBuilder object

      • setCamera

        public Camera.CameraBuilder setCamera(CameraInterface camera)
        This method sets the type of camera being used. Currently, only the MicrosoftLifeCam class implements CameraInterface.
        Parameters:
        camera - The camera.
        Returns:
        The CameraBuilder object

      • setTargetExposure

        public Camera.CameraBuilder setTargetExposure(int exposure)
        This sets the exposure of the camera during target mode. The parameter exposure is on the scale 0 to 100. The default for this is 0.
        Parameters:
        exposure - The target exposure.
        Returns:
        The CameraBuilder object

      • setTargetBrightness

        public Camera.CameraBuilder setTargetBrightness(int brightness)
        This sets the brightness of the camera during target mode. The parameter brightness is on the scale 0 to 100. The default for this is 0.
        Parameters:
        brightness - The target brightness.
        Returns:
        The CameraBuilder object

      • setNormalBrightness

        public Camera.CameraBuilder setNormalBrightness(int brightness)
        This sets the default brightness of the camera when it is not in target mode. The parameter brightness is on the scale 0 to 100. The default for this is 50.
        Parameters:
        brightness - The normal brightness.
        Returns:
        The CameraBuilder object

      • setManualHSVRange

        public Camera.CameraBuilder setManualHSVRange(org.opencv.core.Range hue,
                                              org.opencv.core.Range saturation,
                                              org.opencv.core.Range value)
        This method sets the HSV range of the findTarget method of the Camera class. You do not have to use this method, using setLEDColor will prefill the HSV values. The default color is the same as setLEDColor(LEDColor.GREEN).
        Parameters:
        hue - The hue range.
        saturation - The saturation range.
        value - The value range.
        Returns:
        The CameraBuilder object

      • build

        public Camera build()
        This method takes all of the specified settings and generates a Camera object.
        Returns:
        The camera object.
